ValidationRule.description: For blended projects, the bill rate my only be zero for non Engagement Manager resource roles.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Billing_Type__c,"Blended"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(pse__Resource_Role__c, "Engagement Manager")), OR( pse__Requested_Bill_Rate__c<>0, NOT(ISBLANK(pse__Requested_Bill_Rate__c)) ), ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For blended projects, the bill rate my only be zero for non Engagement Manager resource roles.
